text: un hee ki ek jamaath ne haank lagaayi ke aye madine waalo! tumhaare liye thikaana nahi, chalo laut chalo aur un ki ek aur jamaath ye keh kar Nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasalaam) se ijaazath maangne lagi ke hamaare ghar ghayr mehfooz hai, halaan ke wo (khule hoye aur) ghair mehfooz na thein (lekin) un ka puqta iraada bhaag khade hone ka tha
